data.title: Prodigy of Mobb Deep has died.
data.meta_description: It is with extreme sadness and disbelief that we confirm the death of our dear friend Albert Johnson, better known to millions of fans as Prodigy of...
data.text:
Jun 20, 2017

#1

Paxi

Dagestani MMA Boiled Egg Expert

Joined

Mar 4, 2017

Messages

27,678

It is with extreme sadness and disbelief that we confirm the death of our dear friend Albert Johnson, better known to millions of fans as Prodigy of legendary NY rap duo Mobb Deep. Prodigy was hospitalized a few days ago in Vegas after a Mobb Deep performance for complications caused by a sickle cell anemia crisis. As most of his fans know, Prodigy battled the disease since birth. The exact causes of death have yet to be determined. We would like to thank everyone for respecting the family's privacy at this time.

Feck!

42 is no age.

Love Mobb Deep!

Rest in Peace Prodigy.

Jun 20, 2017

I'm devastated.

Mobb Deep's "Shook Ones" was a gateway to hip-hop for me. That snare is seared into my brain. Spent hours playing this game listening to the song:

Used to be able to recite Prodigy's verse word for word.

I think the prison bid he did a few years had a toll on him. Plus sickle cell is a bitch of a disease. Pound for pound one of the greatest rappers Queens and hip-hop has witnessed.

Just sad.
